summary: Complete frontend testing of Boekhouding module Finance OS styling. All 11 pages tested and passed. UI consistency verified with Dutch number formatting (nl-NL locale), colored icons in rounded-xl containers, and consistent card styling.

minor.issue: Returns 500 error on main dashboard (not boekhouding), but this is outside test scope

issues: Console warning about chart width/height being -1, but chart renders correctly

pages_tested.styling: Finance OS - colored icons, Dutch formatting
Finance OS - stat cards with colored icons
Finance OS - products with SRD 150,00 formatting
Finance OS - BTW codes with percentages
Finance OS - exchange rate chart, CME.sr integration

styling_verification.dutch_number_formatting: PASS - All pages use nl-NL locale (e.g., SRD 2.500,00, SRD 12.500,00)
styling_verification.colored_icons: PASS - Icons in rounded-xl containers with bg-{color}-50 backgrounds
styling_verification.card_styling: PASS - Cards use bg-white border border-slate-100 shadow-sm
styling_verification.header_styling: PASS - h1 uses text-2xl font-semibold text-slate-900
styling_verification.data_testid_attributes: PASS - All pages have proper data-testid attributes

features_tested.feature: Dashboard page loads with KPI cards
BTW page with codes and declaration

seed_data_present.btw_codes: Multiple BTW codes (BTW10, EX, I0, I10, etc.)

context_for_next_testing_agent: All Boekhouding pages have been refactored to Finance OS styling. All 11 pages load correctly with proper data-testid attributes, Dutch number formatting (nl-NL locale), and colored icons in rounded-xl containers. The main dashboard (/api/dashboard) returns 500 errors but this is outside the boekhouding module scope.
